snippet.title: Mega Drive Longplay [198] Alien Storm
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by MadMatty

Played  through 3 times once with each character.  No real differentces between them though.  Although I did switch up the difficulty between each playthrough hopeing to achieve a score of 100, but game just would give me those last 10 points, no idea what I did wrong.

I was hoping to unlock some special ending, but I guess there is non, oh well ;)

I played The Duel at the end.  It was pretty easy after getting my strategy together through the previous palythroughs.  I kept holding onto my energy in case of a bossfight that never happened lol.  But I got 100 points, finaly.

00:00:00 First Playthrough on Normal/Normal (Red Guy)
00:30:16 Second Playthrough on Hard/Easy  (Cylon)
01:02:10 Third Playthrough on Hard/Hard (Yellow Woman)
01:35:04 The Duel (Cyclon) -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
